mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mall.order_carts (order_cart_id, customer_id, product_id, product_amount, product_price, status, order_id) VALUES (#{orderCartId}, #{customerId}, #{productId}, #{productAmount}, #{productPrice}, #{status}, #{orderId})
mapper.select: SELECT order_cart_id, customer_id, order_carts.product_id, product_amount, order_carts.product_price, status, order_id, add_time, product_name FROM mall.order_carts, mall.products WHERE order_carts.product_id = products.product_id AND customer_id = #{customerId} AND status = 1
